channel.title: CVE Feed for Kanban for WordPress -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kanban for WordPress -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-23884|2023-05-09T10:07:15.817Z -- kanban%20for%20wordpress -- kanban%20boards%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Kanban for WordPress Kanban Boards for WordPress plugin <= 2.5.20 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-34368|2023-06-22T12:12:37.605Z -- kanban%20for%20wordpress -- kanban%20boards%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Kanban for WordPress Kanban Boards for WordPress plugin <= 2.5.20 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-40606|2023-12-29T08:59:57.593Z -- kanban%20for%20wordpress -- kanban%20boards%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection') vulnerability in Kanban for WordPress Kanban Boards for WordPress.This issue affects Kanban Boards for WordPress: from n/a through 2.5.21.

item.title: CVE-2024-31103|2024-06-04T17:36:03.842Z -- kanban%20for%20wordpress -- kanban%20boards%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Kanban for WordPress Kanban Boards for WordPress allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Kanban Boards for WordPress: from n/a through 2.5.21.
